standard_tier_price.label: Standard Tier Revenue
standard_tier_price.description: Base price for one complete analysis (Full Ranking + Top 5 Insights)

deep_dive_price.label: Deep Dive Upgrade Price
deep_dive_price.description: Additional cost to unlock Top 15 insights (instead of Top 5)

individual_insight_price.label: Individual Insight Unlock Price
individual_insight_price.description: Cost per additional candidate insight in Full Radar mode

hiring_sprint_charge.label: Hiring Sprint Bundle - Charge Amount
hiring_sprint_charge.description: Amount charged to customer for Hiring Sprint bundle

hiring_sprint_credit.label: Hiring Sprint Bundle - Credit Amount
hiring_sprint_credit.description: Account balance credited for Hiring Sprint bundle ($5 bonus)

volume_bonus_threshold.label: Volume Bonus Threshold
volume_bonus_threshold.description: Minimum custom top-up amount to qualify for volume bonus

volume_bonus_percentage.label: Volume Bonus Percentage
volume_bonus_percentage.description: Percentage bonus applied to custom top-ups above threshold (e.g., 15 = 15%)

minimum_topup_amount.label: Minimum Top-Up Amount
minimum_topup_amount.description: Minimum amount customers can add via Stripe payment (helps manage transaction fees)

new_user_welcome_credit.label: Welcome Credit for New Users (USD)
new_user_welcome_credit.description: Starting balance given to new accounts to help them try the platform.
